name: Winds of War
description:
Winds of War is a multiplayer, shared screen game. You can only play it by using multiple controllers, on Windows. You can jump and flap your wings, in order to create wind and push your adversaries out of the arena, or into the fire.

The game was made by:

Jean-Yves Schael: 3D art

Pierrick Oggier: Music

Frédéric Cottier: Code
